name: Christmas Troubles
description:
Santa needs your help to save Christmas! Santa's Village is looking very sad this year and it seems he's is having a hard time bringing back the Christmas spirit to his little village! By talking to villagers, crafting items and fixing up their houses you might be able to save Christmas in time! 'Christmas Troubles' is a relaxing and cozy experience to get you in the mood for the holidays. 

CRAFT ✂️

By unlocking recipes, picking up items and crafting new ones you can rebuild the village and spread some Christmas cheer! New areas will be unlocked as you make your way through the whole village. 

TALK TO VILLAGERS 🧑‍🤝‍🧑

What happened to Santa's Village? Talk to elves, Frosty the Snowman and other villagers to help you along the way! Unravel the mystery of what happened to this once bright little Christmas village and help wherever you can!

  • 🏠 Fix Santa's Village by repainting and rebuilding houses  
  • 🪓Unlock recipes, pick up items and craft new ones 
  • ☃️ Talk to elves, Frosty the Snowman and villagers to find out what happened in Santa's Village 
  • 🎲 Play a minigame of memory to win new items! 
  • 🎁 And save Christmas before it's too late!!

Santa will be forever grateful for your help! 🎄🎅

!! This game takes around 45 minutes to complete, so there is currently no saving system in place. We recommend playing it in one go! :) !!
